task.title: Add a menu and links to your store
task.shortdesc: With how prevalent social media and the use of other sites are in today's day and age, you’ll likely want to link external sites and accounts to your Shopify storefront.

step.cmd: From the Shopify Admin page, go to Online Store > Navigation.
On the Navigation pane, click the name of the menu you want to edit..
Two input fields will appear. In the Name field, enter the name of the link you want to add. This is what will be displayed.
From the drop-down menu beside the link name, select the link type that best describes the link you’re inputting.
